titlen: Global outage at Microsoft: Major disruptions in aviation
news: Microsoft's cloud services, including Azure, are at the heart of many modern airline operations, and their unavailability has had major impacts. Online reservation systems are inaccessible, causing difficulties for passengers wishing to reserve or change their tickets. Ground operations are disrupted, with notable impacts on baggage handling and passenger services. Aeronautical authorities and airlines are putting in place emergency solutions to compensate for these interruptions
